patthana23.45:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.45:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.45:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
